10
11#include "rtc_base/task_utils/pending_task_safety_flag.h"
12
13namespace webrtc {
14
15// static
16rtc::scoped_refptr<PendingTaskSafetyFlag> PendingTaskSafetyFlag::Create() {
17 return new PendingTaskSafetyFlag(true);
18}
19
20rtc::scoped_refptr<PendingTaskSafetyFlag>
21PendingTaskSafetyFlag::CreateDetached() {
22 rtc::scoped_refptr<PendingTaskSafetyFlag> safety_flag(
23 new PendingTaskSafetyFlag(true));
24 safety_flag->main_sequence_.Detach();
25 return safety_flag;
26}
27
28rtc::scoped_refptr<PendingTaskSafetyFlag>
29PendingTaskSafetyFlag::CreateDetachedInactive() {
30 rtc::scoped_refptr<PendingTaskSafetyFlag> safety_flag(
31 new PendingTaskSafetyFlag(false));
32 safety_flag->main_sequence_.Detach();
33 return safety_flag;
34}
35
36void PendingTaskSafetyFlag::SetNotAlive() {
37 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&main_sequence_);
38 alive_ = false;
39}
40
41void PendingTaskSafetyFlag::SetAlive() {
42 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&main_sequence_);
43 alive_ = true;
44}
45
46bool PendingTaskSafetyFlag::alive() const {
47 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&main_sequence_);
48 return alive_;
49}
50
51} // namespace webrtc
52
